description: This file provides utility functions for building SQL query fragments, including pagination, filters for transactions, and report pagination helpers. It exports functions to generate SQL snippets and parameters for secure database querying in a financial expense tracking backend.

methods.name: buildPagination({ limit = 50, offset = 0 })
methods.description: Returns an object containing SQL snippet and parameters for applying limit and offset to a query.

methods.name: buildTransactionFilters({ accountId, from, to, category })
methods.description: Builds SQL WHERE clause and parameters for filtering transactions based on account ID, date range, and category.

methods.name: buildReportPagination(limit, offset)
methods.description: Provides pagination parameters with defaults, mirroring buildPagination but for primitive values.

ctags.name: buildTransactionFilters
ctags.pattern: /^export function buildTransactionFilters({ accountId, from, to, category }) {$/
